title: Analysis of Trends in Large-Scale Distance Education and Application of Text Mining Techniques

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical knowledge and general understanding of educational technology trends
context.additional_context: A course for professionals analyzing trends in distance education research through text mining. Includes practical sessions using digital devices (laptops/tablets).

learning_goals: Learners can explain the chronological evolution (7 stages) of major themes in distance education research from 1980–2014.
Learners can extract keyword patterns from academic paper abstracts using text mining tools (e.g., Leximancer).
Learners can propose three practical strategies applicable to real-world instructional design based on trends in distance education research.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
